name: Race_Me (Bangabondhu Car Champion League)
description:
This is a car game which will provide an extra fun time while  driving  car in different type of environment. 

The name of the game is Bangabondhu Car Champion League. this game provides an excellent environment with scary zombies. We hope you guys will like it.

For better development, we borrowed some assets from the asset store such as:

1. Standard Asset.

2. Lake side race track.

3. Zombies.

These are the few assets that we have used. Few images that we got from internet and a background music.
